name: The Valley of the Cursed God
name_original: The Valley of the Cursed God
description:
You've been commissioned by a museum to retrieve artifacts from The Valley of the Cursed God! This ancient site is rumoured to contain priceless treasures, but also numerous dangers waiting to befall the unwary! Can you obtain all three sacred relics, while avoiding the valley's curse? It's up to you to make sure these items end up safely in a museum, and not some other treasure hunter's pawn shop!

Suggested soundtrack (original track composed for this game):

Playthrough length: 10-20 minutes

Developed by:
Peter Anthony Smith (Soundole) 
Erin Harrison-Smith (bookwyrmle)

Playtesters:
